scripts.cordova-init: cd cordova && cordova prepare && cordova build
scripts.build-android: NODE_ENV=production webpack --progress --#mode=prod --#platform=android && cd cordova && cordova build android --debug
scripts.build-android-release: NODE_ENV=production webpack --progress --#mode=prod --#platform=android && cd cordova && cordova build android --release --buildConfig=../android-build.json
scripts.run-android: NODE_ENV=production webpack --progress --#mode=prod --#platform=android && cd cordova && cordova run android
scripts.build-ios: NODE_ENV=production webpack --progress --#mode=prod --#platform=android && cd cordova && cordova build ios
